short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keep track of all your deployments

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension helps you keep track of your Salesforce deployments in real-time for all the organizations you're logged in.

You can also get a desktop notification whenever a deployment starts, ends or when the first test fails.

This is a preview version, expect unstability and bugs.

PRIVACY NOTICE: This extension scans the browser for all active Salesforce sessions and makes requests on behalf of the logged in user. From the retrieved information, only the organization domain is stored on the user local storage. All other information is neither stored nor sent to any third party. This project is open source and the public repository contains technical information and diagrams on how it handles data.
